ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: hehehe trust me, try it with the lute, ditch your sword for awhile and have fun. Anything you can kill with HoR, CoD and JWW with weapons you can slaughter
ygData.messageBody:
hehehe trust me, try it with the lute, ditch your sword for awhile and have
fun.

Anything you can kill with HoR, CoD and JWW with weapons you can slaughter
with a lute instead.

You will do roughly 3x as much dmg with CoD using an instrument and it's a
'never miss' kind of dmg so you will do more dmg than you would with
weapons. Especially after adding in the extra dammage you do from punching.
The Warsong speeds you up the same (about 25%) so you will still swing
roughly the same speed, figure 50% of weapon dmg (depending on what you're
using, could be as low as 25%). The Hymn, with a Lute is VASTLY more
efficient. Almost completely negating dmg you take from 1 creature at that
level. Even at 20th with a lute I could take 2, and sometimes 3, blue/white
and even yellow con mobs at a time.

Try it out, all instrument is really the way to go when solo or in a 2
person group. 3 or more I tend to break out weapons depending on group
makeup.

Enjoy!!!
----- Original Message -----
From: "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 15, 2000 1:55 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)


> > From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
>
> > The characters were a joke since the GM's made us delete the
> > characters
> > anyway ;)
>
> The characters were a joke? Oh, you mean they were rogues. ;^) Fitting,
I
> suppose. You could always claim you were roleplaying.
>
> > WOW and I thought that my best friend spent a lot of time
> > roleplaying with
> > 44days played at 20th...
>
> Ahah! A challenge! (Actually the challenge will be to get to 20 before
the
> wide world of EQ comes crashing down due to all it's players movign on to
> other games)
>
> hehe and she spends HOURS just
> > frittering time away
> > talking to folks ;) She loves the social aspect of the game.
> > I keep trying
> > to tell her this isn't MiRC but she loves to chat :)
>
> My game time is spent mostly fishing, drinking, delivering mail, and
> retrieving corpses - sometimes not even my own!
>
> > Kudos on 11th! Have you tried the all-instrument twist of
> > Hymn/Disonnance/Warsong? (punching of course)
>
> Thanks. And no, but I did dust off Disonnance for the first time in ages
> last night. I hadn't used since, oh, level 4, except as an initial taunt
to
> get a mobs attention. But last night I found a nice open area (WC, near
EC)
> and a mob I knew I could take (giant spider) and tried the ol' wince tune
> for laughs. I am TOTALLY sold on the HoR/CoD/JWW medley now. I'd have
> tried it with the lute except I couldn't rightly tell how much damage CoD
> was doing.
>
> Peace
> Evulia, bard of 11 songs, Tunare
>
>
